Posts.Content: I've finished my chemo now but had Fec-T. The fec part was bad , but the T part i was ill, I had the runs for 5 days (had to get tablets to stop it) sickness, sore mouth ( pineapple juice is good), bleeding from my nose, and aching joints it was horendos. When i informed DR I had my dose reduced the next time, sorry to tell you this, however everyone is different and I got through it. All i get now is herceptin i'm up to no 10, 8 to go. I really wish you all well. Its certainly a journey as they say.alii x
Posts.Title: Docetaxal question

Posts.Content: I have finished my chemo (fec-t ) and am left with a very sore veins on my good arm, also they are tightening up. Sometimes I get a dull ache down my arm and pins and needles. I receive herceptin every 3 weeks onto number 9 of 18 sessions, I now ask them to infuse it in the inside of my arm instead of my hand. Has anyone had these problems ?
Posts.Title: Sore good arm

Posts.Content: Hi, I too hated the wig it was so hot and i was covefred in spots, i deciced to make a cotton cap for underneath, it was like a miracle, i can now wear it everyday with no problems. Hope this helps !
Posts.Title: THIRD CHEMO TODAY
